## blockRendering.RenderInfo.shouldStartNewRow\_() method

Decide whether to start a new row between the two Blockly.Inputs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected shouldStartNewRow_(input: Input, lastInput: Input): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | [Input](./blockly.input.md) | The first input to consider |
|  lastInput | [Input](./blockly.input.md) | The input that follows.  True if the next input should be rendered on a new row. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
